examples: She was the last surviving member of the family.
Ella fue el último miembro sobreviviente de la familia.
Of the six people injured in the crash, only two survived.
De las seis personas heridas en el accidente, solo dos sobrevivieron.
Many of these teachers are struggling to survive financially.
Muchos de estos maestros luchan por sobrevivir económicamente.
He must betray his friend in order to survive.
Debe traicionar a su amigo para sobrevivir.
